name: Monotaur (itch)
description:
Guide the Monotaur as he runs to escape the cursed labyrinth. Monotaur is an infinite runner game, inspired by the Minotaur myth. It'll take quick reflexes to defeat the army that stands between you and your freedom.

-5 Fast paced levels.

-6 Different, gameplay changing, skins.

-15+ enemies to conquer and dodge.

Monotaur was designed and animated by Wyatt White

Monotaur was drawn by Kelsie Sara

Monotaur's music was created by John Wood
